# 247Electrician - Complete Business Information

> 247Electrician is a 24/7 emergency electrician service covering the Black Country, Birmingham Central & North, Walsall, Cannock, Dudley, Wolverhampton and the wider West Midlands region in the United Kingdom. We are NAPIT approved, fully insured, and all work is compliant with BS 7671:2018+A2:2022 wiring regulations. Operated by ANP Electrical Ltd, headquartered in Bilston.

## Contact Information

**Primary Phone:** 01902 943 929 (Available 24 hours, 7 days a week)
**WhatsApp:** +44 1902 943 929
**Email:** info@247electrician.uk
**Website:** https://247electrician.uk
**Headquarters:** Bilston, West Midlands, UK

**Response Times:**
- Emergency callouts: 30-90 minutes
- Standard appointments: Same-day or next-day available
- Landlord/trade work: Priority scheduling available

## About the Business

247Electrician is run by Kelvin and Andy, who together have over 65 years of combined experience in the electrical trade. Both are Gold Card JIB (Joint Industry Board) certified electricians and hold current NAPIT (National Association of Professional Inspectors and Testers) approved contractor status.

**Accreditations:**
- NAPIT Approved Contractor
- TrustMark Registered
- Gold Card JIB Electricians
- Fully Insured (Public Liability)
- CRB/DBS Checked

**Key Differentiators:**
- "We Do the Small Jobs Others Hate" - willing to take on minor repairs and single-outlet work
- 24/7 genuine emergency service, not just an answering service
- Card payments accepted (Visa, Mastercard, Apple Pay, Google Pay)
- Same-day digital certificates for landlord work
- Volume discounts for property managers and letting agents

## Residential Electrical Services

### Emergency Services
- **24/7 Emergency Callouts** - Rapid response for power outages, burning smells, sparking outlets, tripped circuits that won't reset
- **Fault Finding & Repairs** - Professional diagnosis using thermal imaging and circuit testing equipment
- **Emergency call-out fee:** From £95 (first hour)

### Installation Services
- **Consumer Unit/Fuse Board Upgrades** - Modern units with RCD/RCBO protection, typically £450-£750
- **Full House Rewiring** - Complete rewire for older properties, Part P certified, from £3,500
- **Partial Rewiring** - Kitchen, bathroom, or extension rewires
- **Lighting Installation** - LED upgrades, downlights, outdoor lighting, smart lighting systems
- **Socket Installation** - Additional sockets, USB sockets, outdoor weatherproof sockets
- **Electric Shower Installation** - New installations and upgrades, correct cable sizing
- **Cooker Installation** - Electric oven and hob connections
- **Ventilation & Extractor Fans** - Bathroom fans, kitchen extractors, PIV systems

### Testing & Certification
- **EICR (Electrical Installation Condition Report)** - Required every 5 years for rentals, from £120
- **Electrical Safety Certificates** - For insurance, mortgage, or sale purposes
- **PAT Testing** - Portable appliance testing for landlords and businesses

### Renewable & Energy
- **EV Charger Installation** - Home charging points, 7kW and 22kW units, OZEV grant approved installer
- **Solar Panel Installation** - PV systems and battery storage
- **Heat Pump Electrical Work** - Electrical connections for air and ground source heat pumps

## Commercial & Trade Services

### Landlord & Property Manager Services

We offer specialist compliance services for landlords, letting agents, estate agents, and property management companies. Volume discounts available:

**Pricing Tiers:**
- **Standard Rate (1-5 properties):** Full price
- **Trade Partner (6-20 properties):** 15% discount on all services
- **Contract Rate (20+ properties):** 25% discount on all services

**Compliance Services Offered:**

1. **EICR Certificates for Landlords**
   - Legal requirement under Electrical Safety Standards in the Private Rented Sector (England) Regulations 2020
   - Required every 5 years or at change of tenancy
   - Pricing: Studio/1-bed £120, 2-3 bed £150, 4-5 bed £180, HMO 6+ rooms £220
   - Same-day digital certificates
   - Re-test after remedial work: £60

2. **Fire Alarm Testing & Installation**
   - Annual professional service required
   - Grade D1 systems for HMOs (mains-powered, interlinked, battery backup)
   - Annual service: £85, 6-monthly HMO service: £65
   - New smoke detector installation: £65/point
   - Full Grade D1 system from £450

3. **Emergency Lighting Testing**
   - Required for HMOs, commercial properties, blocks of flats
   - Monthly functional test: £45
   - Annual 3-hour duration test: £75
   - Monthly + Annual package: £550/year
   - New emergency light unit installation: £85/unit

4. **PAT Testing (Portable Appliance Testing)**
   - Recommended annually for furnished rentals
   - Per appliance: £2.50 (minimum charge £45 for up to 20 items)
   - HMO per room rate: £15 (includes all appliances)
   - Includes pass/fail labels and digital certificate

5. **Smoke & Carbon Monoxide Alarm Compliance**
   - Legal requirement since October 2022: smoke alarm on every storey, CO alarm where fixed combustion appliance
   - Mains smoke alarm with battery backup: £45/unit
   - Interlinked wireless: £55/unit
   - Interlinked hardwired: £65/unit
   - CO alarm (mains): £55/unit
   - Full property compliance package from £180

### Contract Work
For businesses, housing associations, and facilities management companies requiring ongoing electrical maintenance:
- Dedicated account manager for 20+ property portfolios
- Priority emergency response
- Scheduled maintenance programs
- Single monthly invoice option
- Annual testing schedules with reminder service

## Service Coverage Areas

**Primary Service Areas (fastest response):**
- Bilston (Headquarters)
- Wolverhampton
- Walsall
- Dudley
- West Bromwich
- Wednesbury
- Tipton
- Willenhall

**Extended Coverage:**
- Birmingham (Central & North)
- Cannock
- Lichfield
- Telford
- Stourbridge
- Halesowen
- Great Barr
- Oldbury

**Sub-Areas Covered:**
- Wolverhampton: Tettenhall, Bushbury, Wednesfield, Penn
- Walsall: Bloxwich, Aldridge, Brownhills, Pelsall, Rushall
- Sandwell: Smethwick, Rowley Regis, Cradley Heath, Bearwood
- Dudley: Sedgley, Brierley Hill, Kingswinford, Coseley
- Birmingham: Handsworth, Erdington, Harborne, Perry Barr
- South Staffordshire: Wombourne, Codsall, Essington, Coven
- Shropshire: Albrighton, Bridgnorth

## Pricing Guide

**Emergency Services:**
- Emergency call-out (first hour): £95
- Emergency call-out (per additional hour): £65
- Out-of-hours premium: +£25

**Testing & Certificates:**
- EICR 2-3 bed: £150
- PAT testing: £2.50/item (min £45)
- Landlord certificate: From £120

**Installations:**
- Consumer unit upgrade: £450-£750
- Additional socket: £85-£120
- LED downlight (supply & fit): £45/point
- EV charger installation: From £850
- Full rewire (3-bed): From £3,500

**Full rate card available at:** https://247electrician.uk/rate-card

## Legal & Compliance Information

**Company Details:**
- Trading as: 247Electrician
- Operated by: ANP Electrical Ltd
- Registered in England & Wales

**Regulatory Compliance:**
- All work compliant with BS 7671:2018+A2:2022 (IET Wiring Regulations)
- Part P Building Regulations certification provided for notifiable work
- NAPIT registered for self-certification
- Public liability insurance held

**Relevant Legislation We Work With:**
- Electrical Safety Standards in the Private Rented Sector (England) Regulations 2020
- Smoke and Carbon Monoxide Alarm (Amendment) Regulations 2022
- Regulatory Reform (Fire Safety) Order 2005
- Housing Act 2004 (HMO requirements)
- Electricity at Work Regulations 1989
- Health and Safety at Work Act 1974

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Do you offer free quotes?**
A: Yes, we provide free no-obligation quotes for all work. Call 01902 943 929 or use the contact form.

**Q: What areas do you cover?**
A: We cover the Black Country, Birmingham Central & North, Walsall, Cannock, and surrounding areas within approximately 20 miles of Bilston.

**Q: Are you available 24/7?**
A: Yes, we offer genuine 24/7 emergency callouts with a real electrician, not just an answering service.

**Q: Do you do small jobs?**
A: Yes! "We Do the Small Jobs Others Hate" - single socket additions, minor repairs, and small fixes are welcome.

**Q: What payment methods do you accept?**
A: Cash, bank transfer, and all major cards including Visa, Mastercard, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

**Q: Do you offer discounts for multiple properties?**
A: Yes, we offer 15% off for trade partners (6-20 properties) and 25% off for contract clients (20+ properties).

**Q: How quickly can you provide EICR certificates?**
A: Same-day digital certificates are standard. Paper copies available on request.
